column4: im using wicd to connect wirelessly, however when I enable the encryption options, although I give the correct key, it will not authenticate, I have read something about wpa_supplicant, is it installed by default in ubuntu 8.10?
do you use kde or gnome? i had the same problem in kde 4.1 becauce the network manage didn't work asit should do.
im using gnome, with wicd, i got rid of network manager
sorry but i cant help with wicd. sorry. i was just wondering if it is a kde problem for you aswell. sorry
